metadata.title: Kevin Owino, Full-stack Developer, Kisumu/Nairobi
metadata.description: Skilled developer with years of experience in JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Python, TypeScript, SQL, and Git. Building innovative and user-friendly web applications. Let's discuss your project!
metadata.name: Kevin Owino
metadata.keywords: Kevin Owino Developer Nairobi, Kevin Owino Web Developer Nairobi/Kisumu, Full-Stack Developer, Web Application Development, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Python, SQL, Innovative, Git, Back-End Development, Front-End Development, Freelance Developer

info.heading: Hello! I'm Kevin, a Software Developer Turning Ideas into Reality.
info.subtitle:
My projects are not only technically advanced but also infused with creativity. I work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript (React, NextJS), Node.js, Fastify, MongoDB. I'm inspired by the desire to create not just code but stories that captivate attention and enhance the user experience.

Ready to bring your idea to life? Let's create something amazing together!
